description:
Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Soap in Japanese Cherry Blossom is made with skin-loving ingredients, for healthy, beautiful hands. It removes germs and contains NO parabens, phthalates or alcohol.

With natural botanical extracts, Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Japanese Cherry Blossom will gently cleanse & remove germs while leaving your hands feeling soft and smooth.

The smell of spring with cherry blossoms, gardenia and jasmine, sweetened with cherry and raspberry notes.

What we leave out is as important as what we put in.
- No Parabens
- No Phthalates
- No Mineral Oil
- No Alcohol
- No Silicones
- No Soap
- No Animal Derivatives
- No Gluten
- No BPA

This product is made with 100% natural essential oil and is dermatologically tested and pH balanced.

Please recycle us! This bottle is recyclable.

Pack Size: 250mL pump
Refill your pump and save with Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Refills

Use in the bathroom, kitchen and laundry.

FOAMING HAND WASH WITH NATURAL ESSENTIAL OILS: Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Soap Japanese Cherry Blossom is made with 100 percent natural essential oil

SCENTED HAND WASH: The smell of spring with cherry blossoms, gardenia and jasmine, sweetened with cherry and raspberry notes.

FREE FROM: Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oil, Alcohol, Silicones, Soap, Gluten, BPA, and Animal Derived Ingredients

REFILL AND SAVE: you can refill and save with Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash refills

RECYCLABLE BOTTLE: Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Soap pumps are made with a recyclable bottle
name: Palmolive Foaming Liquid Hand Wash Soap Japanese Cherry Blossom 250mL
